name: 吳亦超
objective: This course aims to develop Windows applications using the C# language for students. Through the Windows Forms and WPF interface design tools of the .NET platform, students will be able to develop interactive human-computer interfaces and event-oriented applications. The course emphasizes UI design principles, event-driven architecture, and application skills such as multi-threading and hardware integration in smart devices, human-machine interface (HMI), and Internet of Things applications.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Course and Windows Programming
Week 2: Variables and Expressions
Week 3: Windows Application Programming
Week 4: Basic Control
Week 5: Process Control
Week 6: Loop Structure
Week 7: Array I
Week 8: Array II
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Control Array
Week 11: Comprehensive Application of Two-Dimensional Array
Week 12: Recursion
Week 13: Files Process
Week 14: Comprehensive Application of Advanced Control Items - I
Week 15: Comprehensive Application of Advanced Control Items - II
Week 16: Mouse and Keyboard Event Handling
Week 17: Examples Practices
Week 18: Final Project Demo
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance: 10%
2. Homework (Include Quiz): 30%
3. Midterm: 25%
4. Final Project: 35%
materials:
1. DEITEL, "VISUAL C# HOW TO PROGRAM 6/E (GE)," Chuan Hwa Book Co., LTD., 2017. ISBN: 9781292153469.
2. 邱宏彬、邱奕儒，程式設計基本功與實務範例解析－使用 C#(第四版), 全華，2023，ISBN: 9786263283350。
3.  Baxter-reynolds, Matthew/ Classon, Iris, "Programming Windows Store Apps with C#", O’Reilly Media, 2014. ISBN: 9781449320850.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG2：消除飢餓（Zero Hunger）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）
remarks: The course progress will be fine-tuned according to the actual class situation.The examination will include computer-based practical work and a final project report.
